attributes.action: Stop Legal Aid for non UK Citizens
attributes.background:
Legal aid should not , under any circumstances be used by non UK citizens.
Rapist and Murderers use the legal finance system to fight their extradition after committing these crimes.
Extradition should happen

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because we aren't sure what you would like the happen.

We aren't sure whether you would like legal aid to only be available to British citizens or not be available to non-British citizens who've been convicted of certain offences such as rape and murder.

You could start a new petition setting out clearly what you would like to happen.
